QuoteLineRateAdjustment.name: QuoteLineRateAdjustment
QuoteLineRateAdjustment.description: Represents the negotiated rate adjustment for a quote line item.

AdjustmentType.description: Specifies the type of rate adjustment.

LowerBound.description: The minimum quantity for the adjustment to be applicable.

Name.description: The name of the quote line rate adjustment record.

QuoteLineRateCardEntryId.description: The parent quote line rate card entry associated with the quote line rate adjustment.

UpperBound.description: The quantity below which the adjustment must be applicable. For example, if you want the adjustment to be applicable when the quantity is 99 or less, set this value to 100.
